name: Music_1169.wav
keywords: ['acoustic', 'indie rock', 'male vocal', 'acoustic guitar', 'bass guitar', 'off-key piano', 'acoustic drums', 'gentle', 'easygoing', 'melancholic', 'thai']
caption: This is an acoustic indie rock piece. There is a male vocalist singing gently in the Thai language. An acoustic guitar plays the main tune while a bass guitar is in the background. There is a piano that starts out by supporting the melody, but then wanders towards off-key notes, creating an air of conflict. The atmosphere is melancholic. This piece can be used in the soundtrack of a drama movie/TV show that takes place in Thailand.
